name: DRIVECLUB
summary:
DriveClub is a racing simulation for the PS4, and was one of the first titles announced for the new platform. The game features cars and racing courses modeled after real vehicles and environments. Unique to DriveClub's online multiplayer racing is the ability for six players to form clubs to compete against others, earning fame which can be used for in-game purchases.

DriveClub is available for purchase as a standard retail or digital download, or free-to-play for PlayStation Plus subscribers with the DriveClub PS Plus Edition.

DriveClub did not manage to launch alongside the PS4 hardware in November 2013 due to production delays that would eventually hold the game's release back until October 2014. For at least a week, online multiplayer was difficult to access due the game's servers being swamped by players. Evolution was forced to delay the release of the free-to-play PS Plus Edition version as it worked to alleviate load on DriveClub's servers during the launch week rush.
